name: Precarious Powers
description:
Description

Join the Persevering Purple Protector in their journey to stop the tyrannical Sorcerer of Slime. Along the way be sure to destroy the dark crystals the sorcerer has summoned. They boost the ambient magic in their area and your magic abilities become unstable then explode if your mana orbs reach their capacity! Search the enchanted woods for the 3 legendary spell scrolls while fighting hordes of the sorcerer’s minions to finally put a stop to the dark wizard once and for all!

All original music and audio by Chris Meese

Controls

Controls

WASD/Left Stick = Move

Mouse/Right Stick = Aim

Left Shift/Gamepad A = Void Dash

Right Click/Left Trigger = Ice Field

Left Click/Right Trigger = Fireball

Esc Pause

Credits

Updates

6 hour patch - Fixed a bug where the game never faded back from black after the first respawn
